# timeInterval

**Instance Property**

The time interval selected by the date picker.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var timeInterval: TimeInterval { get set }
```

## Discussion

The time interval that represents the receiver’s date range. The date range begins at the date returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSDatePicker/dateValue]. This method returns 0 when the receiver is not in the NSRangeDateMode mode.

## Accessing Object Values

- **dateValue**: The date selected by the date picker.
